bibl.title: The Egyptian God Tutu. A Study of the Sphinx-god and Master of Demons with a Corpus of Monuments. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 119.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Tutu's name and titles. - 2. The iconography of Tutu. - 3. Towards a definition of Tutu. - 4. Composite images of Tutu. - 5. Tutu's place among the gods. - 6. Cults of Tutu. - 7. The Tutu stelae and statuary. - 8. Tutu in personal names and on coinage. - 9. The origins of Tutu and his role in magic. - Catalogue of monuments [186 items]. - Bibliography and abbreviations. Indices.
